snippet.title: Touken Ranbu Warriors – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Touken Ranbu Warriors will be released across North America on May 24th, 2022.

"A secret Sengoku Era drama begins now"

Touken Ranbu Warriors is the first-ever console game in the Touken Ranbu series. The all-new experience promises to combine the Touken training of the Touken Ranbu -ONLINE- simulation game with the breath-taking action of KOEI TECMO's popular WARRIORS musou series.
 
Touken Ranbu Warriors features 15 characters from Touken Ranbu -ONLINE-, where famous swords take the form of warriors named Touken Danshi (swordsmen), and the elite fighters are sworn to protect history.
 
Visit the website: https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/touken-warriors/
